entry.title: I missed your 21st birthday | Buck and Eddie
entry.summary:
Author: titaniclikeship003

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,718Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 59

Summary: When Buck's birthday falls in the week Eddie is gone in Texas, what's a guy to do except get blackout-drunk at the bar with the 118? Really, what is the worst that could happen when your tongue is loose and you miss your best friend? Well, as Buck learns very quickly, a secret is only a secret if you keep it to yourself. or Buck just wants two things. A dragonfruit freeze from Taco Bell, and Eddie. EDIT: WAIT OMG GUYS I DIDNT KNOW GRACIE ABRAMS BIRTHDAY IS ALSO TODAY?! I literally just used her song cause it fit the ficgrjiekofgjrnfekmqfrwgenjfkmw

entry.title: Fire is love
entry.summary:
Author: Ilove911onABC

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,020Chapters: 19/25Kudos: 45

Summary: Buck and Eddie are both secretly signed up for a reality dating show‚ÄîBuck by his sister Maddie, Eddie by his sister Sofia. Shocked to find each other there, they play along and date other contestants, but jealousy and chemistry keep pulling them back together. A twist pairs them on a date, where long-hidden feelings finally surface.

entry.title: Five minutes in heaven
entry.summary:
Author: Ackorna

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,661Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 29

Summary: After years of dancing around their feelings, Buck and Eddie finally get trapped together in an elevator ‚Äî and the moment they‚Äôve been avoiding ignites into something real. What starts as heat and teasing quickly grows into something much deeper as they navigate their feelings, the teasing from the 118, and introducing this new dynamic to Christopher.From late-night conversations and nervous confessions to first arguments and quiet makeups, Buck slowly goes from being a guest in Eddie‚Äôs house to truly belonging there. With Maddie‚Äôs blunt sisterly humor, Carla‚Äôs gentle nudges, Christopher‚Äôs blunt honesty, and the team‚Äôs endless ribbing, the Diaz-Buckley household becomes a place full of warmth, laughter, and family.This is a slow build that becomes a love story ‚Äî about choosing each other, about making a home, and about finally realizing that Buck isn‚Äôt just part of Eddie and Christopher‚Äôs life. He is their life.

entry.title: THE GHOST PROTOCOL
entry.summary:
Author: Chickennuggies613

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,328Chapters: 31/31Kudos: 30

Summary: Evan ‚ÄúBuck‚Äù Buckley is a legend‚Ä¶ at least among special operations circles. A career Navy SEAL with a perfect mission record and an uncanny ability to survive the impossible. Until one mission went too far.During a covert arms-interdiction op overseas, Buck was captured, tortured, and left for dead. The official word: KIA.But after a year in the shadows, Buck resurfaces in a daring solo escape, carrying with him proof of a vast conspiracy inside the military-industrial complex. He‚Äôs wounded, traumatized‚Ä¶ and now a walking target.As Buck tries to expose the betrayal that nearly killed him, the people around Eddie ‚Äî Bobby, Athena, Hen, Chimney, Maddie ‚Äî are drawn into a deadly game of secrets, assassins, and government cover-ups.They‚Äôre civilians. He‚Äôs a soldier.But together? They‚Äôre a damn good team.

entry.title: The man I buried, the man I found.
entry.summary:
Author: Noasshowaddiction

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 42,092Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 55

Summary: Evan Buckley buried the love of his life years ago. Eddie Diaz‚Äôs death was the wound Buck never recovered from‚Äîthe folded flag, the funeral, the medals pressed into his hands were all he had left.Except Eddie isn‚Äôt dead.When Eddie walks into the 118 as their newest firefighter, Buck‚Äôs world comes crashing down all over again. Grief collides with longing, fury with love, and suddenly Buck is forced to face the man he mourned, the man who promised he‚Äôd come back, and the man who let him believe he never would.Working side by side should be impossible. Pretending they‚Äôre just coworkers is unbearable. And when secrets, old promises, and new dangers come to light, Buck has to decide whether the man he buried is the same one he‚Äôs found‚Äîor if some ghosts can never be forgiven.

entry.title: The Cost Of Loving You
entry.summary:
Author: Iceprincess96

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,845Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 63

Summary: Eddie thought that when he finally confessed his love to Buck, he had found his happy ending. But the universe seemed intent on testing him. Three months into their relationship, Buck breaks up with him over pancakes, leaving Eddie shattered. As Buck moves on and starts seeing someone new, Eddie spirals, hiding his heartbreak behind a fragile mask of friendship. When the weight of unspoken feelings finally cracks, both men are forced to confront the love, fear, and mistakes that kept them apart. With the 118 as witnesses, and Chris as the heart between them, Eddie and Buck must navigate heartbreak, trust, and the slow, painful road to redemption ‚Äî discovering that love can survive even when it‚Äôs broken. ¬† Previous Title - Shattered and whole

entry.title: Even the Dead Still Breathe
entry.summary:
Author: BlckOnyx

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 57,266Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 43

Summary: It has been a year since Bobby‚Äôs death, and Buck has never been the same. Grief eats at him in quiet ways the rest of the 118 can‚Äôt quite reach, so when he announces he‚Äôs taking a break and heading abroad, everyone tells themselves he deserves the space. A week later, he disappears. Weeks turn into months, and the people he left behind are forced to believe the unthinkable‚Äîthat Buck walked away for good. Until the headlines change, and the word ‚Äúpresumed dead‚Äù settles over them like ash. What none of them know is that Buck‚Äôs story didn‚Äôt end there. His grief, his secrets, and the dangerous truth he‚Äôs been carrying all lead back to a past no one at the 118 ever imagined. And when the pieces finally surface, the loss they thought they understood becomes something else entirely. How will the 118 deal with losing people they love, only to find out later that it was all a lie? OR Buck disappeared, and the truth might destroy what‚Äôs left of the family they built.

entry.title: Controlled Burn
entry.summary:
Author: FreckledAdvocate

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,002Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 145

Summary: A young man wearing nothing but bright pink sparkly boy shorts is kneeling over their patient with a finger pressed under his chin monitoring his pulse.‚Äú63 year old male, experienced a transient cardiac event. He was unconscious for about a minute before CPR brought him back. Probably an arrhythmia triggered by adrenaline.‚ÄùEddie nods and goes to move around the man to address the patient directly, when Ravi throws him completely out of step with a single word.‚ÄúBuck?!‚ÄùWhat? What?!‚ÄúAh, fuck.‚Äù Buck curses, ‚ÄúOf course they sent the 118.‚Äù-------------OR--------------Eddie is working a rare rotation on B-shift and heard that A-shift had a rough week in his absence. He's looking forward to having Buck over later to make sure he's okay after a few bad losses on the job. He wasn't planning on running into him half naked, surrounded by terrifying kinky equipment, triaging someone who played a little too hard at one of LA's BDSM sex clubs. Eddie's about to go through a whole bunch of self-discoveries, not all of them kink related.

entry.title: where the heart hides (maybe it was you all along)
entry.summary:
Author: lovingdiaz118

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,313Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 11

Summary: He wasn‚Äôt noise. He was clarity. ¬†Buck.God, he missed him. More than he had let himself admit, until tonight. Not just the laughter or the loyalty, but the safety. Buck was the one person who Eddie could rely on, no questions asked. He would be able to turn to him in any time of need, and Buck would show up, always.
